title: How to Make Super Sweet Salad (Candy)

steps.headline: Open all the fruit roll-ups and cut them in half.
Slice the Air Heads into pieces too.
Cut the Hershey's bliss into half, or leave as is.
Toss everything together!
steps.description: Make sure to even the stuff out.

text: Open all the fruit roll-ups and cut them in half.  Slice the Air Heads into pieces too.  Add some sour worms.  And licorice, cut into pieces.  Cut the Hershey's bliss into half, or leave as is.  Toss everything together! Make sure to even the stuff out. Finished.
